scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm --prefix checkout run dev" "npm --prefix home run dev" "npm --prefix shop run dev"
scripts.build: npx concurrently "npm --prefix checkout run build" "npm --prefix home run build" "npm --prefix shop run build"
scripts.serve: npx concurrently "npm --prefix checkout run start" "npm --prefix home run start" "npm --prefix shop run start"
